name: The League of Uniform Nomenclature Strikes
effectText: Target 1 face-up monster you control; equip 2 monsters with the same original name as that target from your hand, Deck, and/or GY to that target as Equip Spells, and if you do, it cannot attack or be destroyed by battle while equipped with those 2 cards. You cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, except monsters with the same original Type as the targeted monster. You can only activate 1 "The League of Uniform Nomenclature Strikes" per turn.
